items.sentence: Why are you apologizing? You\'ve done nothing wrong.
Tom felt Mary\'s forehead to see if she had a fever.
Tom finally figured out what he\'d been doing wrong.
Tom said he didn\'t know why Mary didn\'t like John.
Last night, I went to bed without brushing my teeth.
I\'ll try not to disturb you while you\'re studying.
I\'m afraid Tom and Mary won\'t get along very well.
Tom always trusts people, even people he shouldn\'t.
Tom told me that I shouldn\'t go out alone at night.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t like carbonated drinks.
